dmca.title: DMCA Notice

_____

Subject: DMCA Notice


Hello,
 
This is a DMCA notice for the following link to a set of files being
distributed by
your system illegally by a website owner operating a file storage site
hosted on your

issue to the 
service provider ThePlanet.com
 
The site hosting this file is www. <http://www.MEGAFILEZ.COM> MEGAFILEZ.COM
with a ip thats registered to theplanet.com
70.87.91.2. The link to the file being hosted illegally is
http://www.megafilez.com/v/6224492/1_VST_presents_.ipanel.v2.09.1_Nulled.rar
.html

This link if for a set of files of out software called ipanel that can be

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described

I hear by ask that this set of files be removed from your system to prevent
any
 futher damages to us financially or have the site removed till the comply
to remove our
copyrighted material. 

I am the owner of the said software ryan shaffer and can be contacted at

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification

Thanks,
Ryan Shaffer
